name: Myth-17 (Updated 1st February 18 for PC )
description:
M-17 is a 3D Horror game which you need to escape from the building(M-17) before the torch light running out of battery. There were 7 keys you need to escape from M-17. 

What's new in update 15 January?

-NEW CREEPY EFFECT FOR PC !!!!!!!!

-More challenging game play

-First Aid kit

-Minor bug fixed
